text: Menachem Zilberman (6 October 1946 - 13 January 2014) was an Israeli actor, comedian and songwriter. Zilberman was born in Eilat, Mandatory Palestine (now Israel). He started working in 1965. He most often worked as a stand-up comic. Zilberman died from a heart attack on 13 January 2014, aged 67, in Los Angeles, California in the United States. He had lived there since 2000. He was survived by his three children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Israeli comedians Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli television actors Category:Jewish Israeli actors Category:Israeli songwriters
title: Menachem Zilberman
